Objective:
 Guess the secret 4-digit number chosen by the computer.


Game Rules:
 • The computer randomly selects a 4-digit number with unique digits (no repeating digits).
 • You have to guess the correct number.


Feedback System:
 After each guess, you will receive feedback:


Strike: A digit is correct and in the correct position.
 Ball: A digit is correct but in the wrong position.
 Out: None of the digits are correct.


Examples:
 If the secret number is 1234:
 • Guess 1235 → 3 Strikes, 0 Balls (1, 2, 3 are correct)
 • Guess 4321 → 0 Strikes, 4 Balls (all digits exist but wrong positions)
 • Guess 5678 → 0 Strikes, 0 Balls (Out)
 • Guess 1324 → 2 Strikes, 2 Balls (1, 2 correct position, 3, 4 wrong position)


Winning:
 Get 4 Strikes to win the game!


Good luck!

Objective:
 A 2-player reaction speed game. Be the first to draw when the signal appears!


Setup:
 • This game requires 2 players sharing one phone.
 • One player holds the phone from the top, the other from the bottom.
 • Each player has their own DRAW button on their side.
 • The top button is rotated 180° for the top player's convenience.


How to Play:
 1. Press Play to start the game.
 2. A 5-second Ready countdown will appear.
 3. The game screen appears with a RED background.
 4. After a random time (up to 15 seconds), the screen turns BLUE and shows DRAW! in the center.
 5. When you see BLUE, quickly press your DRAW button!


Winning:
 • Press your button AFTER the screen turns blue → You WIN!
 • The faster player wins.


Losing:
 • Press your button BEFORE the screen turns blue → You LOSE!
 • This is called a "false start."


Tips:
 • Stay focused and watch for the color change.
 • Don't press too early!
 • React as fast as you can when you see blue.


Good luck, and may the fastest draw win!
